synthesis_conditions.time: Not specified for synthesis, 12 h for activation
other_conditions: Exposed to various harsh conditions including boiling water, acidic (pH = 1) and alkaline solution (pH = 13), 100% relative humidity, and air at room temperature for > 4 weeks without loss of crystallinity
High thermal stability up to 425 °C under nitrogen atmosphere
